statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT customer_id, clicks, impressions FROM customer_engagement_metrics
SELECT campaign_id, conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM customer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, impressions, conversions, clicks FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 1 AND campaign_id = 2
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, clicks, impressions, conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT campaign_id, customer_id, clicks, impressions, conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE conversions < 5
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, impressions, conversions, clicks FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE impressions BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 AND clicks > 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, campaign_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, clicks, impressions, conversions FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 3 AND conversions > 0 ORDER BY customer_id, clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE total_engagement < 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE total_engagement < 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, engagement_score FROM customers WHERE engagement_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000.00;
SELECT campaign_id, name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE engagement_score < 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN campaign_engagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id WHERE ce.interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY ce.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT c.name AS campaign_name, COUNT(ce.customer_id) AS total_engagement FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_engagement ce ON c.campaign_id = ce.campaign_id WHERE c.budget > 5000 GROUP BY c.name;

SELECT ce.interaction_date, c.name AS campaign_name, cu.name AS customer_name FROM campaign_engagement ce JOIN campaigns c ON ce.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN customers cu ON ce.customer_id = cu.customer_id ORDER BY ce.interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, campaign_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(clicks) AS max_clicks FROM metrics;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.name = 'John' AND interactions.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT interactions.interaction_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM metrics JOIN interactions ON metrics.interaction_id = interactions.interaction_id GROUP BY interactions.interaction_id HAVING total_clicks > 10 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_date FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, campaign_name FROM customers JOIN engagements ON customers.customer_id = engagements.customer_id JOIN campaigns ON engagements.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, engagement_type, engagement_duration FROM engagements WHERE engagement_date < NOW() AND engagement_type = 'Click';

SELECT purchases.purchase_id, purchases.purchase_amount, engagements.engagement_date FROM purchases JOIN engagements ON purchases.engagement_id = engagements.engagement_id ORDER BY purchases.purchase_timestamp DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.customer_name, engagements.engagement_type, clicks.click_timestamp FROM customers LEFT JOIN engagements ON customers.customer_id = engagements.customer_id LEFT JOIN clicks ON engagements.engagement_id = clicks.engagement_id;
